data.title: Medal commemorating the wedding of Princess Giovanna to â€¦
data.meta_description:
Medal commemorating the wedding of Princess Giovanna to Tsar Boris III of Bulgaria in Assisi, 1930.  
Silver, diameter 30 mm, weight 11,5 g, with die-cutter signature "E.MONTI" and maker's mark "JOHNSON", unhinged specimen (no bail has been removed!). Beautiful state of preservation.
On October 25, 1930, Princess Giovanna of Italy (1907-2000), third daughter of King Victor Emmanuel III of Italy (1869-1947) and his wife Elena (1873-1952), married Tsar Boris III of Bulgaria (1894-1943) at the Franciscan Basilica in Assisi, in accordance with a personal vow made by Giovanna. With Boris she had two children, Simeon (b. 1937), the last Bulgarian Tsar, and Princess Maria-Luisa (b. 1933).
Condition: II +
